Question: In 1999 this person played a supporting role as a satirical Roman Catholic cardinal in Kevin Smith's movie Dogma.
Hints: This person was also cast in Away We Go, a 1967 comedy show that aired on CBS.
The book, chronicling most of this person's life and future plans (including the one-man show) was published in 2009.
The audio edition is narrated by this person's brother, Patrick.
